Description:
You know Copilot as your AI assistant - helping to boost your productivity, providing contextual intelligence, and automating repetitive tasks. Increasingly, Copilot is a valuable partner for you and your team as you collaborate together. From Copilot Chat to agents in Teams, AI contributes to how Frontier Firms collaborate. Learn about the latest innovations in multi-user AI and how your organization can improve your collaboration.

Chapters: 0:00 - Overview of AI evolution and move toward collaborative AI 00:00:45 - Microsoft Teams as the hub for human and agent collaboration 00:01:00 - Teams mission: making collaboration simple, smart, and secure 00:09:02 - Joining the meeting with Facilitator assistance 00:10:42 - Facilitator generates a strategy document from discussion 00:15:27 - Demonstrating SharePoint's content awareness and automation 00:17:27 - Explaining metadata challenges and automation benefits 00:25:47 - AI agent identifies correct contact and creates a task 00:33:14 - Session wrap-up and call to explore Microsoft AI tools

Title: Reimagine collaboration with multi-user AI | BRK284
